mapper.sql: _pre_start_order_record_t.id, _pre_start_order_record_t.iccid, _pre_start_order_record_t.imsi, _pre_start_order_record_t.order_id orderId, _pre_start_order_record_t.accessory_imsi accessoryImsi, _pre_start_order_record_t.start_time startTime, _pre_start_order_record_t.expected_finish_time expectedFinishTime, _pre_start_order_record_t.status, _pre_start_order_record_t.create_time createTime, _pre_start_order_record_t.update_time updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into (id, iccid, imsi, order_id, accessory_imsi, start_time, expected_finish_time, status, create_time, update_time) values(#{preStartOrderRecord.id}, #{preStartOrderRecord.iccid}, #{preStartOrderRecord.imsi}, #{preStartOrderRecord.orderId}, #{preStartOrderRecord.accessoryImsi},#{preStartOrderRecord.startTime}, #{preStartOrderRecord.expectedFinishTime}, #{preStartOrderRecord.status}, #{preStartOrderRecord.createTime},#{preStartOrderRecord.updateTime})
